title: Client Not Working
body: When i open my client it says "We have restored this installation to an older version of League of Legends. Now we'll try to patch it up to the latest version." Then after i click "ok" it says "There was a problem patching League of Legends. We'll restore a backup version and try updating again after you restart the patcher. After i click "restart" it opens my client up again and says the same thing over and over.

replies.body: There were some strange complications overnight, but most of those have been fixed by now. Still, your issue could be different so hit up our tech team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if you still can't get your client patched up.
